title: your game is broke
body: 6 times didn't get my role for ranked in a row. had to play off role 5 out of 6. one game out of 6 someone was nice enough to trade. shoiuldnt have to miss out on diamond because I get  my role

replies.body: If [*Autofill*](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/competitive/ranked-updates-now-live#patch-autofill) was enabled, then it would have filled you in any role (in this case, secondary role) due to high queue times. Do you often play during *off-peak* hours?

Actually, it looks like I was wrong. You're correct that autofill protection would prevent them from getting autofilled twice in a row. I think there may be some missing context from OP regarding exactly what happened. So when queueing up, with autofill protection or if autofill isn't enabled, you're guaranteed to get one of your picks (main or secondary) but **not just your primary role**. 

I hope this clarified things a bit more. ^.^

Can't believe this guy is nice enough to reply to a thread that is simply titled "Your game is broke" 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
